content: I'm thinking of getting my coffee table refinished. I have a mid-century modern piece that I got at a garage sale, but the finish is scratched and faded. Do you know any good resources for finding a reliable furniture restorer in my area? By the way, speaking of antiques, I just got back from an antique store in the nearby town with my friend Rachel, and I scored this gorgeous Art Deco brooch from the 1920s - it was only $50!
